episodes.title: Episode 2.1
episodes.description: Sent north by Alfred to ransom enslaved king Guthred, Beocca seeks help from Uhtred, who makes a new allegiance in his quest for vengeance.

episodes.title: Episode 2.2
episodes.description: Abbot Eadred exploits Guthred's weaknesses, and Uhtred, leading Cumbraland's men to Eoferwic, faces a harsh betrayal.

episodes.title: Episode 2.3
episodes.description: Hild and Ragnar search for Uhtred as he plans his escape. Alfred eyes Mercia's kingdom, and chaos ensues as Guthred's alliance collapses.

episodes.title: Episode 2.4
episodes.description: Sent to Northumbria, Uhtred treads carefully between loyalty to Alfred and aiding Ragnar's feud with Kjartan.

episodes.title: Episode 2.5
episodes.description: Amidst a season of peace, Uhtred feels a mystical calling to follow his fate. Erik makes a clever request, and Beocca navigates matters of the heart.

episodes.title: Episode 2.6
episodes.description: Alfred's distrust of Uhtred grows deeper, leading him to send Æthelred to drive Erik and Sigefrid from London. However, Æthelred harbors ambitions of his own.

episodes.title: Episode 2.7
episodes.description: Æthelred faces humiliation for his London blunder, forcing Alfred into a corner. With shifting loyalties, Æthelflæd makes a dire appeal to Uhtred.

episodes.title: Episode 2.8
episodes.description: Defying Alfred, Odda pushes the king into war. Uhtred conspires with Erik to rescue Æthelflæd, culminating in a fateful confrontation with Sigefrid.
